name: Healthier Slow Cooker Beef Stew I
author: MakeItHealthy
summary: This hearty and delicious stew is perfect for the rainy days of fall. By adding more vegetables and using reduced-sodium beef broth I make this recipe extra healthy for my family. Increasing the amount of garlic also helps ward off any colds!
ingredients: 2 pounds beef stew meat, cut into 1 inch cubes
¾ pound butternut squash, peeled and cut into small chunks
½ head escarole, washed and torn into bite-sized pieces
directions: Mix together flour, salt, and pepper in a small bowl
Pour over meat and stir to coat
Stir in garlic, bay leaf, paprika, Worcestershire sauce, onion, beef broth, potatoes, carrots, celery, and butternut squash
Cover and cook on Low for 10 to 12 hours or on High for 4 to 6 hours
Cover and cook until escarole is tender, 15 to 20 minutes
